channel.title: Please Help Me Stuck with this for 3 Weeks HELP
channel.description:
well , i really need help with this this is something what seems that cant be fixed
i have been trying to search for fixed for over three weeks well actually no1 trying to help [size=12pt][size=14pt]at Rune-server ...my problem is whenever a friend trys to run the client i made with jarmaker this comes up a java exception has occurred but the .jar file[/size][/size] i made with the jarmaker works for me perfectly fine it runs etc i did the jarring part a few times to see if the jarring whasnt correct but i think that with this is not the case
Help? me : Best help trough Skype? : Beast.pk :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :palm:

item.title: Please Help Me Stuck with this for 3 Weeks HELP
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“justinmperry, post:3, topic:542820”][quote author=ijzer dragon link=topic=661696.msg4422764#msg4422764 date=1399245148]
well , i really need help with this this is something what seems that cant be fixed

i have been trying to search for fixed for over three weeks well actually no1 trying to help
[size=12pt][size=14pt]at Rune-server …my problem is whenever a friend trys to run the client i made with jarmaker
this comes up a java exception has occurred but the .jar file[/size][/size]
i made with the jarmaker works for me perfectly fine it runs etc
i did the jarring part a few times to see if the jarring whasnt correct but i think that with this is not the case

Help? me :
Best help trough Skype? : Beast.pk :palm:
[/quote]

Could you give me a link of the client you made into a .jar? The client in a folder. It sounds to me like a auto cache download problem and I can fix that.[/quote]
You wouldn’t even need his client. You’d need the cache.
Make sure the other kid using the client has his java permissions set to medium.

Read full topic
item.source: Please Help Me Stuck with this for 3 Weeks HELP

[size=12pt][size=14pt]at Rune-server …my problem is whenever a friend trys to run the client i made with jarmaker
this comes up a java exception has occurred but the .jar file[/size][/size]
i made with the jarmaker works for me perfectly fine it runs etc
i did the jarring part a few times to see if the jarring whasnt correct but i think that with this is not the case

Help? me :
Best help trough Skype? : Beast.pk :palm:[/quote]

Could you give me a link of the client you made into a .jar? The client in a folder. It sounds to me like a auto cache download problem and I can fix that.

Read full topic
